<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Item&nbsp;7.01. Regulation FD Disclosure. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Change to our Historical Financial Results in connection with Keurig Green Mountain, Inc.&#146;s Merger with Dr Pepper Snapple Group, Inc. </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and subsidiaries (collectively, &#147;we,&#148; &#147;our&#148; or &#147;Mondel&#275;z International&#148;) are furnishing
this current report to provide supplemental financial information related to the retrospective impact on our financial statements due to a change in accounting principle following the July&nbsp;9, 2018 closing of the merger of Keurig Green Mountain,
Inc. (&#147;Keurig&#148;) with Dr Pepper Snapple Group, Inc. (&#147;DPSG&#148;). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">As previously disclosed in our Form
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> for the period ended June&nbsp;30, 2018, Keurig closed on its definitive merger agreement with DPSG on July&nbsp;9, 2018 and formed Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (&#147;KDP&#148;), a publicly traded company.
Following the close of the merger, our ownership in KDP was 13.8%. As was the case in our ownership interest in Keurig, we will have significant influence with respect to KDP, and we will continue to account for our investment in KDP under the
equity method, resulting in recognizing our share of KDP earnings within our earnings and our share of KDP dividends within our cash flows. In connection with this transaction, we changed our accounting principle to reflect our share of
Keurig&#146;s historical and KDP&#146;s ongoing earnings on a <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">one-quarter</FONT> lag basis while we continue to record dividends when cash is received. We determined a lag was preferable as it enables us to continue
to report our quarterly and annual results on a timely basis and to record our share in KDP&#146;s ongoing results once KDP has publicly reported its results. This change in accounting principle was applied retrospectively to all periods. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This change in accounting principle has resulted in revisions of our historical financial results for reported equity method investment net earnings, net
earnings and earnings per share (&#147;EPS&#148;) as well as for our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial results for Adjusted EPS. The changes described above will have no impact on our previously reported consolidated net
revenues, gross profit or operating income, nor on our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial results for Organic Net Revenue, Adjusted Gross Profit and Adjusted Operating Income, for any period. These changes also do not amend
or modify any disclosure contained in, or reflect events occurring subsequent to the filing of, our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the fiscal year ended December&nbsp;31, 2017. See the chart below and Exhibit
99.1 for the revised unaudited GAAP and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial information for the first half of 2018, all quarters of 2018 and 2017 and for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2017 and 2016. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">See Schedule 2 of Exhibit 99.1 to this Current Report for reconciliations of the differences between these revised adjusted <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">(non-GAAP)</FONT> financial measures and their most directly comparable revised (GAAP) financial measures. Equity method investment net earnings and Provision for income taxes are components used to calculate Net earnings
and Diluted earnings per share attributable to Mondel&#275;z International. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Financial Measures
</I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We use <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial information and believe it is useful to investors as it provides additional
information to facilitate comparisons of historical operating results, identify trends in our underlying operating results, and provide additional insight and transparency on how we evaluate our business. We use
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures to budget, make operating and strategic decisions and evaluate our performance. We have detailed below the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments that we make
in our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> definitions affected by this change in accounting principle. The adjustments generally fall within the following categories: acquisition&nbsp;&amp; divestiture activities, gains and losses on
intangible asset sales and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-cash</FONT> impairments, major program restructuring activities, constant currency and related adjustments, major program financing and hedging activities and other major items
affecting comparability of operating results. We believe the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> measures should always be considered along with the related U.S. GAAP financial measures. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The definitions of our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures did not change as a
result of this change in accounting principle. For all periods presented in this Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K,</FONT> our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measure Adjusted EPS is defined below and can also be
found within our historically reported Annual Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> and Quarterly Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> for periods presented. As new events or circumstances arise, this
definition could change over time. When definitions change, we provide the updated definitions and present the related <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> historical results on a comparable basis <SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(1)</SUP>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>Adjusted EPS</I> &#150; defined as diluted EPS attributable to Mondel&#275;z
International from continuing operations excluding the impacts of the 2014-2018 Restructuring Program <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(2)</SUP>; gains or losses (including <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-cash</FONT> impairment
charges) on goodwill and intangible assets; net earnings from divestitures <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>; divestiture <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>&nbsp;or acquisition gains or losses and related
divestiture <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>, acquisition and integration costs <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(3)</SUP>;
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts from commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivative contracts <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(4)</SUP>; impact from
resolution of tax matters <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(5)</SUP>; CEO transition remuneration <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(6)</SUP>; impact from pension participation changes <SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(7)</SUP>; incremental expenses related to the 2017 malware incident; losses on debt extinguishment and related expenses; gains or losses on interest rate swaps no longer designated as accounting cash flow
hedges due to changed financing and hedging plans; gain on equity method investment transactions; and U.S. tax reform discrete impacts <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(8)</SUP>. Similarly, within Adjusted EPS, our equity method
investment net earnings exclude our proportionate share of our investees&#146; unusual or infrequent items <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(9)</SUP>. We believe that Adjusted EPS provides improved comparability of underlying operating
results. We also evaluate growth in our Adjusted EPS on a constant currency basis <SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">(10)</SUP>. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(1)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">When items no longer impact our current or future presentation of
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> operating results, we remove these items from our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> definitions. During the second quarter of 2018, we added to the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> definitions the exclusion of the impact from pension participation changes - see footnote (7)&nbsp;below. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(2)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments related to the 2014-2018 Restructuring Program
reflect costs incurred that relate to the objectives of our program to transform our supply chain network and organizational structure. Costs that do not meet the program objectives are not reflected in the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(3)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Divestitures include completed sales of businesses and exits of major product lines upon completion of a sale
or licensing agreement. Refer to Note 2, <I>Divestitures and Acquisitions</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2017 for more information on divestitures and acquisitions
impacting the comparability of our results. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(4)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">During the third quarter of 2016, we began to exclude unrealized gains and losses <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">(mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts) from outstanding commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivatives from our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> earnings measures
until such time that the related exposures impact our operating results. Since we purchase commodity and forecasted currency contracts to mitigate price volatility primarily for inventory requirements in future periods, we made this adjustment to
remove the volatility of these future inventory purchases on current operating results to facilitate comparisons of our underlying operating performance across periods. We also discontinued designating commodity and forecasted currency transaction
derivatives for hedge accounting treatment. To facilitate comparisons of our underlying operating results, we have recast all historical <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> earnings measures to exclude the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">mark-to-market</FONT></FONT> impacts. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(5)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Refer to Note 12, <I>Commitments and Contingencies &#150; Tax Matters, </I>in our Annual Report on Form <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2017 for additional information. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(6)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">On November&nbsp;20, 2017, Dirk Van de Put succeeded Irene Rosenfeld as CEO of Mondel&#275;z International in
advance of her retirement at the end of March 2018. In order to incent Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put to join us, we provided him compensation with a total combined target value of $42.5&nbsp;million to make him whole for incentive awards he forfeited or
grants that were not made to him when he left his former employer. The compensation we granted took the form of cash, deferred stock units, performance share units and stock options. In connection with Irene Rosenfeld&#146;s retirement, we made her
outstanding grants of performance share units for the 2016-2018 and 2017-2019 performance cycles eligible for continued vesting and approved a $0.5&nbsp;million salary for her service as Chairman from January through March 2018. We refer to these
elements of Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s and Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s compensation arrangements together as &#147;CEO transition remuneration.&#148; We are excluding amounts we expense as CEO transition remuneration from our 2017 and future <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> results because those amounts are not part of our regular compensation program and are incremental to amounts we would have incurred as ongoing CEO compensation. As a result, in 2017, we excluded amounts
expensed for the cash payment to Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put and partial vesting of his equity grants. In 2018, we excluded amounts paid for Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s service as Chairman and partial vesting of Mr.&nbsp;Van de Put&#146;s and
Ms.&nbsp;Rosenfeld&#146;s equity grants. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(7)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The impact from pension participation changes represents the charges incurred when employee groups are
withdrawn from multiemployer pension plans and other changes in employee group pension plan participation. We exclude these charges from our non&#150;GAAP results because those amounts do not reflect our ongoing pension obligations. See Note 10,
<I>Benefit Plans</I>, in our Quarterly Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> for the quarterly period ended June&nbsp;30, 2018 for more information on the multiemployer pension plan partial withdrawal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">3 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(8)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">On December&nbsp;22, 2017, the United States enacted tax reform legislation that included a broad range of
business tax provisions. As further detailed in Note 14, <I>Income Taxes</I>, in our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2017, our accounting for the new legislation is not complete
and we have made reasonable estimates for some tax provisions. We exclude the discrete U.S. tax reform impacts from our Adjusted EPS as they do not reflect our ongoing tax obligations under U.S. tax reform. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(9)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">We have excluded our proportionate share of our equity method investees&#146; unusual or infrequent items such
as acquisition and divestiture related costs, restructuring program costs and discrete U.S. tax reform impacts, in order to provide investors with a comparable view of our performance across periods. Although we have shareholder rights and board
representation commensurate with our ownership interests in our equity method investees and review the underlying operating results and unusual or infrequent items with them each reporting period, we do not have direct control over their operations
or resulting revenue and expenses. Our use of equity method investment net earnings on an adjusted basis is not intended to imply that we have any such control. Our GAAP &#147;diluted EPS attributable to Mondel&#275;z International from continuing
operations&#148; includes all of the investees&#146; unusual and infrequent items. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(10)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Constant currency operating results are calculated by dividing or multiplying, as appropriate, the
current-period local currency operating results by the currency exchange rates used to translate the financial statements in the comparable prior-year period to determine what the current-period U.S. dollar operating results would have been if the
currency exchange rate had not changed from the comparable prior-year period. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">We believe that the presentation of these <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures, when considered together with our U.S. GAAP financial measures and the reconciliations to the corresponding U.S. GAAP financial measures, helps provide a more complete understanding of
the factors and trends affecting our business than could be obtained absent these disclosures. Because <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures vary among companies, the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT>
financial measures presented in this report may not be comparable to similarly titled measures used by other companies. Our use of these <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures is not meant to be considered in isolation
or as a substitute for any U.S. GAAP financial measure. A limitation of the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures is they do not include all items of income and expense that affect us and have an impact on our U.S. GAAP
reported results. The best way to address this limitation is by evaluating our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures in combination with our U.S. GAAP reported results and carefully evaluating the reconciliations of
U.S. GAAP reported figures to the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial measures. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:16pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Financial Schedules </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Exhibit 99.1 to this Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K</FONT> contains financial schedules that provide the reconciliations for our revised reported
equity method investment net earnings, net earnings and EPS and our <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial results for Adjusted EPS after this change in accounting principle for the first half of 2018, all quarters of 2018 and
2017 and for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2017, 2016 and 2015. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Item&nbsp;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) The following exhibit is being furnished with this Current Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">8-K.</FONT> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>

99.1 <A HREF="d637939dex991.htm">Financial schedules &#150; Unaudited GAAP and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Financial Information. </A></TD></TR>

hereunto duly authorized. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.20em; text-indent:-3.20em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Title:&#8195;Executive Vice President and</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:3.20em; text-indent:-3.20em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#8195;&#8195;&#8202;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Chief Financial Officer</P></TD></TR>

</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><B>Exhibit 99.1 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>U.S. GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Reconciliations </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">In addition to reporting our U.S. GAAP operating results, we have historically reported <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> financial
information. Refer also to our Quarterly Reports on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-Q</FONT> and our Annual Report on Form <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">10-K</FONT> for the periods presented for additional information on our GAAP to <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-GAAP</FONT> adjustments. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 1.1 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Condensed Consolidated Statements of Earnings </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(in millions of U.S. dollars and shares, except per share data) </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="71%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 1.2 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Condensed Consolidated Statements of Earnings </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(in millions of U.S. dollars and shares, except per share data) </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="19" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1.00pt solid #000000"><B>For the Three Months Ended June&nbsp;30, 2018</B></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(in millions of U.S. dollars and shares, except per share data) </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">9 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 1.5 </U></P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">10 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">11 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 2.6 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Net Earnings and Tax Rate </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(in millions of
U.S. dollars and shares, except per share data) </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="64%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="1%"></TD>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 3.1 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Diluted EPS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 3.2 </U></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 3.3 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Diluted EPS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 3.4 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Reconciliation of GAAP to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-GAAP</FONT> Measures </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Diluted EPS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>(Unaudited) </B></P>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">30 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right"><U>Schedule 3.8 </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:10pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Mondel&#275;z International, Inc. and Subsidiaries </B></P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">31 </P>
